questions.question: What is the purpose of ecumenical dialogue?

choices.answer: Conversation
Unification
Social justice
Mutual understanding

questions.question: Why are Elders in Aboriginal communities given significant status and respect?

choices.answer: They promote modern non-Aboriginal spiritualities
Possess sacred knowledge of Aboriginal spirituality
lead all negotiations among Aboriginals for land rights
they encourage young people to enter professions

questions.question: What effect do Native Title, Mabo and Wik decisions have on Aboriginal spiritualities?

choices.answer: They support the concept of terra nullius
they discourage the economic ambitions of pastoralists
they contribute to revitalisation of Aboriginal traditions
they address past economic injustices to Aboriginals

questions.question: Within Aboriginal spirituality, which of the following requires ceremonial initiation?

choices.answer: belonging to ritual estate
adoption of language group
transition into adult roles
introduction to totemic group

questions.question: How was the formation of the Uniting Church in 1977received by the Christian Churches involved?

choices.answer: Almost all Methodists supported it
Almost all Methodists opposed it.
Almost all Congregationalists opposed it.
Almost all Presbyterians supported it.

questions.question: If you were planning a New Age religion study tour the most likely destinations to include are

choices.answer: The Ka'ba, Mecca, River Ganges India
Angkor Wat Cambodia and St Pauls Cathedral London
Wailing Wall Jerusalem & Anzac Cove Gallipoli
Stonehenge Salisbury & Festival of body, mind spirit Oslo

questions.question: The following is a distinctive feature of Aboriginal spirituality?

choices.answer: High value on material possessions
values competition within Aboriginal communities
values competition between Aboriginal communities
makes on separation between the spiritual and the secular

questions.question: Which of the following statements about Aboriginal native title is true?

choices.answer: Wik Decision found native title coexists with pastoral lease
Bringing them home first legal recognition native title
Mabo Decision found Terra Nullius was correct for Australia
Native Title is not recognised as a human right

questions.question: What has been the most obvious change in the religious landscape if Australia since 1945?

choices.answer: Percentage of Australians who are Jewish grown dramatically
Immigration has increased diversity of religious expressions
Family size in some religious traditions has increased.
percentage  Australians who are Christian grown dramatically
